scripts.show-ip: node -e "const os=require('os');const nets=os.networkInterfaces();let ip='';for(const name of Object.keys(nets)){for(const net of nets[name]){if(net.family==='IPv4'&&!net.internal){ip=net.address}}}console.log('\n============================================================');console.log('     READY â€” YOUR LOCAL IP IS: '+ip);console.log('     FRONTEND: http://'+ip+':3000');console.log('     BACKEND:  http://'+ip+':3001');console.log('============================================================\n');"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "sleep 5 && npm run show-ip"
